section.heading: Review of Board’s decision.
section.text: Any person aggrieved by the decision of the Director may seek review of such decision in the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Judicial review by District of Columbia Court of Appeals, see § 2-510.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 47-4431, § 51-111, and § 51-119.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 210 of District of Columbia Unemployment Compensation Comprehensive Improvements Temporary Amendment Act of 1992 (D.C. Law 9-260, March 27, 1993, law notification 40 DCR 2330).

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: The District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act, referred to in this section, is Chapter 5 of Title 2.
